settings.title: ABOUT {US}
settings.text:
Born from a desire to offer premium piercing practices. SkinKandy has become the largest piercing specialist in Australia, starting from humble beginnings in 2010 to now having 80+ stores* locations across Australia and New Zealand.

SkinKandy has become the ultimate destination for fashion - conscious customers who understand the transformative power of the perfect accessory. Our commitment to quality, safety and innovation sets us apart, making us the top choice for those who value both beauty and craftsmanship in their body art. This is why our customer chooses SkinKandy.

settings.title: AUSTRALIAâ€™S LARGEST SPECIALIST IN {BODY} {PIERCING} {AND} {JEWELLERY}
settings.text:
Using only the best equipment and hygiene methods, we provide a fun and family-friendly environment in every one of our stores throughout Australia.

You can find SkinKandy in over 60+ Shopping Centres across Queensland, New South Wales, Victoria, Western Australia and South Australia
